column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Visiting Chicago from New York and chose this as the destination to try deep dish pizza. The spinach stuffed bread appetizer was really
column3: although good for what it was
column5: was underwhelming. Also - you have to wait 45 minutes for the deep dish
column6: just as an FYI if you are in a rush! The service here was top notch.
